Security Analyst

Monitor systems for security breaches, conduct vulnerability assessments, and respond to incidents.

💰 $75,000/year 📈 32% growth
🎯

💰 $95,000/year 📈 28% growth
⚙️

Security Engineer

💰 $110,000/year 📈 35% growth

💰 $140,000/year 📈 30% growth

💰 $85,000/year 📈 33% growth
